availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Livingston County, Kentucky, grocer. Native of Ireland. Grocer in Livingston County in 1860. Member of Smithland Masonic Lodge in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Armstrong, Amy, comp. Worldwide Masonic Directory, 1860 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations Inc, 2001, Post 2427, Smithland, KY.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, Smithland, p. 274.
National Archives and Records Administration (NARA); Washington, D.C.; Federal Mortality Census Schedules, 1850-1880, and Related Indexes, 1850-1880; Archive Collection: T655; Archive Roll Number: 15; Census Year: 1869; Census Place: Smithland, Livingston, Kentucky; Page: 932
